messages.text: Lufthansa Group Inspirational AI flight assistant. Nice to meet you!
BETA TEST: Imagine you are planning your next holiday, and you are using this chatbot to find a travel destination and associated flight. What kind of atmosphere or memories are you hoping for?
I want to fly to zurich next saturday. Only me and I want to stay for 7 days. Can you give me 3 cheapest options?
Sorry, I am unable to assist you with this request.
I want to fly to zurich next saturday. Only me and I want to stay for 7 days. Can you give me 3 cheapest options?
To find the cheapest flight options to Zurich for your trip, I'll need to know your departure city. Could you please provide the city you're flying from?
